Furthermore, the present study is also motivated by the desire
to devise a white near-UV LED because Eu
(M = Ca, Sr, and Ba) phosphors exhibit blue,
orange-yellow, and green emission, respectively. Herein, we
report on the highly enhanced luminescence of N
(M = Ca, Sr, and Ba) and a
white near-UV LED using three phosphors.
